owl:Ontology.dc:contributor: Paola Espinoza Arias (Ontology Engineering Group - Universidad Politécnica de Madrid)
owl:Ontology.dc:creator: Oscar Corcho (Ontology Engineering Group, Universidad Politécnica de Madrid and Localidata)
owl:Ontology.dc:title: Vocabulario para la representación de datos asociados a la tarjeta de transporte público
owl:Ontology.rdfs:comment: Vocabulario para la representación de los datos asociados a la tarjeta de transporte público.
Vocabulary to represent the data associated to the transport card.
owl:Ontology.rdfs:label: Tarjeta de Transporte
Transport Card

rdfs:Datatype.dc:creator: OGC GeoSPARQL 1.0 Standard Working Group
rdfs:Datatype.dc:description: A GML serialization of a geometry object.
rdfs:Datatype.rdfs:comment: A GML serialization of a geometry object.
rdfs:Datatype.rdfs:label: GML Literal
rdfs:Datatype.skos:definition: A GML serialization of a geometry object.

rdfs:Datatype.dc:creator: OGC GeoSPARQL 1.0 Standard Working Group
rdfs:Datatype.dc:description: A Well-known Text serialization of a geometry object.
rdfs:Datatype.rdfs:comment: A Well-known Text serialization of a geometry object.
rdfs:Datatype.rdfs:label: Well-known Text Literal
rdfs:Datatype.skos:definition: A Well-known Text serialization of a geometry object.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: La parada del medio de transporte pertenece a una zona tarifaria.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: corona tarifaria
Línea a la que pertenece una parada

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: El medio de transporte es gestionado por determinado operador.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: operador

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Parada que pertenece a una línea
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: parada

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Charge type of the transport card. It is defined by the concept scheme: http://vocab.linkeddata.es/datosabiertos/kos/transporte/tipo-carga
Tipo de carga de la tarjeta de transporte. Se define mediante el esquema de conceptos: http://vocab.linkeddata.es/datosabiertos/kos/transporte/tipo-carga
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: charge type
tipo de carga

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: El usuario tiene una tarjeta de transporte que tras ser cargada con un título de viaje le habilita a utilizar un medio de transporte.
The user has a transport card that, after being loaded with a travel title, enables him to use the transport.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has card
tiene tarjeta

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Perfil de usuario de la tarjeta (normal, joven, tercera edad, etc.) Se representa mediante el esquema de conceptos: http://vocab.linkeddata.es/datosabiertos/kos/transporte/perfil
User's profile. It is represented by the concept scheme: http://vocab.linkeddata.es/datosabiertos/kos/transporte/perfil
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: perfil
profile

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Card's title. It can be anual, mensual, touristic, etc. It is represented by the scheme concept: http://vocab.linkeddata.es/datosabiertos/kos/transporte/titulo
Título que contiene la tarjeta de transporte (anual, 30 días, familias numerosas, etc.) Se representa mediante el esquema de conceptos: http://vocab.linkeddata.es/datosabiertos/kos/transporte/titulo
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: title
título

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: El tipo de validación que se aplica a la tarjeta. Los tipos pueden ser: abono, multiviaje o sencillo. Se representa mediante el esquema de conceptos: http://vocab.linkeddata.es/datosabiertos/kos/transporte/tipo-validacion
The type of validation applied to the card. It is represented by the concept scheme: http://vocab.linkeddata.es/datosabiertos/kos/transporte/tipo-validacion
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: tipo de validación
validation type

owl:ObjectProperty.dc:creator: OGC GeoSPARQL 1.0 Standard Working Group
owl:ObjectProperty.dc:description: A spatial representation for a given feature.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: A spatial representation for a given feature.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: hasGeometry
owl:ObjectProperty.skos:definition: A spatial representation for a given feature.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relation between an entity and a Property of that entity.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has property
owl:ObjectProperty.skos:definition: Relation between an entity and a Property of that entity.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relation between a Property and the entity it belongs to.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: is property of
owl:ObjectProperty.skos:definition: Relation between a Property and the entity it belongs to.

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The locality. For example, Mountain View.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: addressLocality
localidad

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: La región. Por ejemplo, Provincia de Zaragoza o Comunidad Autónoma de Aragón
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: addressRegion
región

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Gender of the person. While http://schema.org/Male and http://schema.org/Female may be used, text strings are also acceptable for people who do not identify as a binary gender.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: gender
género

owl:DatatypeProperty.dc:creator: OGC GeoSPARQL 1.0 Standard Working Group
owl:DatatypeProperty.dc:description: The GML serialization of a geometry
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The GML serialization of a geometry
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: asGML
owl:DatatypeProperty.skos:definition: The GML serialization of a geometry

owl:DatatypeProperty.dc:creator: OGC GeoSPARQL 1.0 Standard Working Group
owl:DatatypeProperty.dc:description: The WKT serialization of a geometry
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The WKT serialization of a geometry
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: asWKT
owl:DatatypeProperty.skos:definition: The WKT serialization of a geometry

owl:DatatypeProperty.dc:creator: OGC GeoSPARQL 1.0 Standard Working Group
owl:DatatypeProperty.dc:description: Connects a geometry object with its text-based serialization.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Connects a geometry object with its text-based serialization.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has serialization
owl:DatatypeProperty.skos:definition: Connects a geometry object with its text-based serialization.

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A bus, coach or tram stop
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Bus Stop

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A metro, tram or underground station PTAN.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Metro Stop Point

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A railway station PTAN.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Rail Stop Point

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A NaPTAN stop definition.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Stop Point

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Tipo de parada de autobús. Este tipo de paradas se encuentran dentro de los intercambiadores o estaciones de autobús
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Dársena

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Son las líneas de los medios de transporte
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Línea

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Operador de los medios de transporte
Operador de los medios de transporte.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Operador

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Zona que permite definir la tarifa del sistema de transporte.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Zona Tarifaria

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Card for the public transport system
Tarjeta para el sistema público de transporte
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Tarjeta de transporte
Transport Card

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Card charge at the sale point.
Carga de la tarjeta en el punto de venta.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Card charge
Carga de la tarjeta

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Card charge observation of the transport card.
Observación de la carga de la tarjeta del sistema de transporte.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Card charge observation
Observación de la carga de la tarjeta

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Result of the transport card charge
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Card charge result
Resultado de la carga de tarjeta

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Result of the transport card validation.
Resultado de la validación de la tarjeta de transporte
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Card validation result
Resultado de validación de la tarjeta

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Observación de la validación de la tarjeta de transporte
Observation of the transport card validation
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Card Validation
Validación de la tarjeta

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Sensor del punto de pago
Sensor pay point
owl:Class.rdfs:label: DPayPoint
DPayPoint

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Sensor del punto de venta.
Sensor of the sale point
owl:Class.rdfs:label: DSalePoint
DSalePoint

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Entrada del usuario al sistema de transporte
User entry at the transport system
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Entrada de Usuario
User Entry

owl:Class.dc:creator: OGC GeoSPARQL 1.0 Standard Working Group
owl:Class.dc:description: The class represents the top-level geometry type. This class is equivalent to the UML class GM_Object defined in ISO 19107, and it is superclass of all geometry types.
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The class represents the top-level geometry type. This class is equivalent to the UML class GM_Object defined in ISO 19107, and it is superclass of all geometry types.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Geometry
owl:Class.skos:definition: The class represents the top-level geometry type. This class is equivalent to the UML class GM_Object defined in ISO 19107, and it is superclass of all geometry types.

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A Point is a 0-dimensional geometric object and represents a single location in coordinate space. A Point has an x-coordinate value, a y-coordinate value. If called for by the associated Spatial Reference System, it may also have coordinate values for z and m. The boundary of a Point is the empty set.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Point

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A quality of an entity. An aspect of an entity that is intrinsic to and cannot exist without the entity.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Property
owl:Class.skos:definition: A quality of an entity. An aspect of an entity that is intrinsic to and cannot exist without the entity.
